statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_trends;
SELECT id, hashtag, trend_date FROM social_media_trends;
SELECT * FROM social_media_trends WHERE trend_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT hashtag, trend_time FROM social_media_trends WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, hashtag, trend_date, trend_time FROM social_media_trends ORDER BY trend_date DESC, trend_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_trends WHERE id = 1;
SELECT hashtag, trend_date FROM social_media_trends WHERE trend_date = '2022-11-15';
SELECT * FROM social_media_trends WHERE hashtag LIKE '%#dataanalysis%' ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT id, trend_time FROM social_media_trends WHERE hashtag = '#socialmedia' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT hashtag FROM social_media_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-11-01' AND '2022-11-30';
SELECT * FROM Hashtags;
SELECT hashtag_text, trending_rank FROM Hashtags ORDER BY trending_rank DESC;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_text FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE hashtag_id = 3;
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM SocialMediaPosts ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Hashtags WHERE trending_rank > 10 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY post_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT hashtag_text, trending_rank FROM Hashtags WHERE trending_rank IS NOT NULL ORDER BY trending_rank DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Hashtags H JOIN SocialMediaPosts P ON H.hashtag_id = P.hashtag_id WHERE H.hashtag_id = 3 AND P.post_date = '2021-06-30';
SELECT hashtag_text, COUNT(*) AS post_count FROM Hashtags H JOIN SocialMediaPosts P ON H.hashtag_id = P.hashtag_id GROUP BY H.hashtag_text HAVING post_count > 5 ORDER BY post_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaPosts;
SELECT post_content, post_author FROM SocialMediaPosts;
SELECT post_content, post_author, post_date FROM SocialMediaPosts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_author FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_author='Alice';
SELECT post_content, hashtag_name FROM SocialMediaPosts JOIN PostHashtags ON SocialMediaPosts.post_id = PostHashtags.post_id JOIN Hashtags ON PostHashtags.hashtag_id = Hashtags.hashtag_id;
SELECT post_content, post_author FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM SocialMediaPosts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_author, COUNT(post_id) AS post_count FROM SocialMediaPosts GROUP BY post_author HAVING post_count > 2;

SELECT p.post_id, p.post_content, h.hashtag_name FROM SocialMediaPosts p JOIN PostHashtags ph ON p.post_id = ph.post_id JOIN Hashtags h ON ph.hashtag_id = h.hashtag_id WHERE h.hashtag_name = 'technology';
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_author = 'Alice' AND post_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM TrendingHashtags;
SELECT hashtag_name, post_count FROM TrendingHashtags WHERE post_count > 100;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM SocialMediaPosts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT username, followers_count FROM UserProfiles WHERE following_count > followers_count;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM SocialMediaPosts;
SELECT * FROM TrendingHashtags ORDER BY hashtag_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_likes > 100 ORDER BY post_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT hashtag_name, post_count FROM TrendingHashtags WHERE post_count > 100 ORDER BY post_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, followers_count, following_count FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY followers_count DESC, following_count ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_id, post_content, hashtag_name FROM SocialMediaPosts JOIN TrendingHashtags ON SocialMediaPosts.hashtag_id = TrendingHashtags.hashtag_id ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE followers > 100;
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes FROM posts ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT * FROM hashtags WHERE hashtag_name = 'tech';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM trends WHERE trend_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE followers > 100 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE followers BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(post_id) AS total_posts FROM posts GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_posts > 5;
SELECT p.post_id, p.post_content, u.username FROM posts p JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.user_id WHERE p.likes >= 100 ORDER BY p.likes DESC;
SELECT h.hashtag_name, COUNT(ph.post_id) AS total_posts FROM hashtags h JOIN post_hashtags ph ON h.hashtag_id = ph.hashtag_id GROUP BY h.hashtag_name ORDER BY total_posts DESC;
